content:
/>
XI.iii.1.A.1.k
.
Definition:  Place of Death
The
place of death
is the place shown by the death certificate or other acceptable evidence of death.
Reference
:  For more information on acceptable evidence of death, see
38 CFR 3.211
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A  - General Information on Burial Benefits and Allowances
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
